update_title: Skyrim Voice Decoder Beta tester release
description: Initial beta release of the Skyrim Voice Decoder project, established as the foundation for automated voice processing.

changes: - Core system implementation for ESP/ESL data extraction and voice line categorization
- Integration of automated FUZ to WAV/LIP conversion and analysis tools
- Development of the unified Audio Manager with support for XTTS, ElevenLabs, and localized AI generation
- Added native Windows failsafe for audio playback (winsound) to ensure reliability
- Implementation of the real-time Mod Analyzer with live update tracking
